flawed_nl_solution:
He cuts off 50/5=<<50/5=10>>10 feet
So he has 50-10=<<50-10=44>>44 feet left
He gives half away which means he has 44/2=<<44/2=22>>22 feet
So he has 22/2=<<22/2=11>>11 sections
